attributes.action: Ban the refusal to serve our armed forces
attributes.additional_details: Join the cause to ban the discraceful practace of bars and restaurants refusing to serve members of the armed forces because they are in uniform. For too long it has been acceptable for establishments to turn away our boys. Its time to take a stand, we need as many signitures as possible so this can be discussed in parliament. Spread the word to help stop this discrace.
